context: Hi, can you recommend me something good from the 80s? I like Ferris Bueller's Day Off (1986) I'm good thanks
Well, I enjoy Fast Times at Ridgemont High and The Breakfast Club (1985)
Those were classics! Can you think of anything else?
resp: Ghostbusters (1984) and Back to the Future (1985) , which is my favorite movie
